Cust harness racing breeder Laura Smith’s passion for horses leads to thriving business https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/cust-harness-racing-breeder-laura-smiths-passion-for-horses-leads-to-thriving-business/2WV7FW4RENACTTCP5GGXQ7I5VEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/cust-harness-racing-breeder-laura-smiths-passion-for-horses-leads-to-thriving-business/2WV7FW4RENACTTCP5GGXQ7I5VEI/ "I dreamed of owning my own farm and I always wanted to be involved with horses." Mon, 16 Dec 2024 21:54:35 +0000 Cust harness racing breeder Laura Smith has a special bond with horses which she believes is essential for success in this competitive industry. She is pictured here with mare One Over Da Skye.

Photo / File
